title: Into the Grizzly Maze. Official Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2015)
description:
In theaters: June 26th, 2015

Description:

James Marsden, Thomas Jane, Piper Perabo and Academy AwardÃ‚Â® winner Billy Bob Thornton star in this action-packed adventure set in the Alaskan wilderness. After a relentless grizzly starts to wreak havoc on a small town, the sheriff heads into the forest to find his ecologist wife but instead crosses paths with his estranged, ex-con brother. They soon find themselves on the run from the massive killer bear. The hunted become the hunter in this edge-of-your seat thriller about the power of nature and the smell of blood.

Director: David Hackl

Writers: Guy Moshe, J.R. Reher

Actors: James Marsden, Billy Bob Thornton, Thomas Jane, Piper Perabo, Michaela McManus, Adam Beach, Scott Glenn

Genre: Action and Adventure, Horror, Thriller
